form.label: ATT&CK Matrix Risk View
form.description: This dashboard portrays risk in your environment through the lens of RBA and the MITRE ATT&CK framework

search.query: | tstats values(All_Risk.annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_tactic) as mitre_tactic, values(All_Risk.annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_technique) as mitre_technique values(All_Risk.savedsearch_description) as search_name values(All_Risk.risk_object_type) as risk_object_type values(All_Risk.impact) as impact from datamodel=Risk by _time, All_Risk.risk_object | `drop_dm_object_name("All_Risk")`
```Preload MITRE matrix once per page``` |mitremap | outputlookup attack_matrix.csv
| sseanalytics | fields name, mitre_id, enabled, | search mitre_id!="None" | outputlookup available_searches

```Populate risk attributions for each [sub]technique from the risk index. Load lookup at dashboard-load time, dependent on timerange picker``` index=risk annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_technique_id=* | table search_name risk_object risk_object_type annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_tactic annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_technique annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_technique_id | lookup mitre_matrix_list.csv TechniqueIdCombined AS annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_technique_id OUTPUT Technique, Sub_Technique, Tactic | table Tactic Technique Sub_Technique | stats count as technique_count by Tactic Technique Sub_Technique | eval IsSubTechnique=if(Sub_Technique!="-","Yes","No") | lookup mitre_matrix_list Tactic Technique OUTPUT Sub_Technique AS Sub_Technique_List | eval Sub_Technique_List=mvfilter(Sub_Technique_List!="-") | eval sub_technique_count=case(Sub_Technique!="-",technique_count) | outputlookup attack_environment_counts

| inputlookup available_searches | lookup mitre_matrix_list.csv TechniqueIdCombined AS mitre_id OUTPUT Technique, Sub_Technique, Tactic | table Tactic Technique Sub_Technique | stats count as technique_count by Tactic Technique Sub_Technique | eval IsSubTechnique=if(Sub_Technique!="-","Yes","No") | lookup mitre_matrix_list Tactic Technique OUTPUT Sub_Technique AS Sub_Technique_List | eval Sub_Technique_List=mvfilter(Sub_Technique_List!="-") | eval sub_technique_count=case(Sub_Technique!="-",technique_count) | outputlookup rr_rule_environment_counts.csv

| tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Risk by All_Risk.annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_tactic, All_Risk.annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_technique, All_Risk.annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_technique_id, All_Risk.risk_object | rename All_Risk.* as * | lookup mitre_matrix_list TechniqueIdCombined as annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_technique_id OUTPUT Tactic, Technique Sub_Technique TechniqueIdCombined | stats count as risk_object_count by Tactic Technique Sub_Technique risk_object TechniqueIdCombined | eval risk_object=risk_object."::".risk_object_count | mvcombine delim="," risk_object | nomv risk_object | eval IsSubTechnique=if(Sub_Technique!="-","Yes","No") | lookup mitre_matrix_list local=true Tactic Technique OUTPUT Sub_Technique AS Sub_Technique_List | eval Sub_Technique_List=mvfilter(Sub_Technique_List!="-") ```| eval sub_technique_count=case(Sub_Technique!="-",risk_object_count)``` | eval sub_technique_count=risk_object_count | outputlookup risk_object_attack_environment_counts.csv

condition.set: index=risk | fields search_name risk_object risk_object_type annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_tactic annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_technique annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_technique_id | lookup mitre_attack_lookup mitre_technique_id as annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_technique_id OUTPUT mitre_tactic mitre_technique_id | stats dc(mitre_technique_id) as techniques_used by mitre_tactic | append [|inputlookup mitre_attack_lookup | stats dc(mitre_technique_id) as total_techniques by mitre_tactic ] | stats values(techniques_used) as techniques_used, values(total_techniques) as total_techniques by mitre_tactic | fillnull value="0" techniques_used | eval combo = techniques_used." of ".total_techniques | transpose 0 header_field=mitre_tactic | search column=combo | eval reset_token="$reset_token$" | table initial-access execution persistence privilege-escalation defense-evasion credential-access discovery lateral-movement collection command-and-control exfiltration impact | rename initial-access as "Initial Access", execution as Execution, persistence as Persistence, privilege-escalation as "Privilege Escalation", defense-evasion as "Defense Evasion", credential-access as "Credential Access", discovery as Discovery, lateral-movement as "Lateral Movement", collection as Collection, command-and-control as "Command and Control", exfiltration as Exfiltration, impact as Impact

| inputlookup rr_rule_environment_counts.csv | stats count as techniques_covered by Tactic | rename Tactic as mitre_tactic | append [|inputlookup mitre_attack_lookup | stats dc(mitre_technique_id) as total_techniques by mitre_tactic ] | replace initial-access with "Initial Access", execution with Execution, persistence with Persistence, privilege-escalation with "Privilege Escalation", defense-evasion with "Defense Evasion", credential-access with "Credential Access", discovery with Discovery, lateral-movement with "Lateral Movement", collection with Collection, command-and-control with "Command and Control", exfiltration with Exfiltration, impact with Impact, reconnaissance with Reconnaissance, resource-development with "Resource Dev" in mitre_tactic | stats values(techniques_covered) as techniques_covered, values(total_techniques) as total_techniques by mitre_tactic | fillnull value="0" techniques_covered | eval combo = techniques_covered." of ".total_techniques | transpose 0 header_field=mitre_tactic | search column=combo | eval reset_token="$reset_token$" | table "Initial Access" Execution Persistence "Privilege Escalation" "Defense Evasion" "Credential Access" Discovery "Lateral Movement" Collection "Command and Control" Exfiltration Impact

single.title: RBA-Afforded Decrease in Notable Count (from legacy notables)

search.query: | multisearch [| search index=notable NOT search_name="Risk*" | eval old_notables="1"] [ search index=notable search_name="Risk*" | eval new_rba_notables="1"] | stats count(old_notables) as old_notables, count(new_rba_notables) as new_rba_notables | eval difference=round(100-((new_rba_notables/old_notables)*100),2) | fields difference

chart.title: Aggregated Risk Alerts vs. Risk Attribution (legacy notables)

search.query: | multisearch [| search index=notable NOT search_name="Risk*" | eval old_notables="1"] [ search index=notable search_name="Risk*" | eval new_rba_notables="1"] | eval new_or_old=case(old_notables="1","Risk Contributions",new_rba_notables="1","Actionable Risk") | timechart span=1h count by new_or_old
